headline: Motorola Solutions Record Results Refocus Investor Attention On Public Safety Growth
summary: Motorola Solutions reported record revenue, earnings, operating margins, and cash flow, alongside a record order backlog. The company secured major long term contracts across public safety and defense, reinforcing demand visibility. Recent acquisitions of Silvus and Blue Eye expanded AI powered video and defense technology capabilities. New FedRAMP authorization was granted for the SVX body worn assistant and CommandCentral DEMS cloud solutions for law enforcement. Motorola Solutions...

headline: Assessing Motorola Solutions (MSI) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Motorola Solutions overview Motorola Solutions (MSI) has been drawing attention after a period of strong longer term returns, with the stock now around $453.44 and recent performance differing sharply between the past year and the past 3 years. See our latest analysis for Motorola Solutions. The 1 day share price return of 7.67% and 30 day share price return of 15.97% suggest short term momentum has picked up, even though the 1 year total shareholder return of a 1.64% decline contrasts with a...

headline: US Stock Market Today S&P 500 Futures Edge Lower As Traders Watch Inflation
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Friday, Feb, 13 2026 US stock futures are mixed this morning, with S&P 500 contracts slightly softer while Nasdaq futures hover flat, as investors brace for January inflation at 2.5% year on year. That figure, along with monthly gains of 0.3% in both headline and core CPI, matters because it shows the cost of living is easing but not quickly. At the same time, the US 10 year yield is sitting near 4.11%, and a pullback in existing home sales of 8.4%...
